title: Factories monitored day and night for emissions (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) The Shanghai Environment Monitoring Center is using Internet technology to supervise the operation of more than 150 big factories in Shanghai, officials said recently. These factories account for 85
